statements: SELECT * FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_name, level FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, experience FROM player_progress WHERE level > 5;
SELECT player_id, level, experience FROM player_progress WHERE experience < 1000;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE level = 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, experience FROM player_progress WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT DISTINCT player_name FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_progress ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, level FROM player_progress WHERE level BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM player_progress;
SELECT AVG(experience) FROM player_progress;
SELECT MAX(level) FROM player_progress;
SELECT MIN(experience) FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_name, SUM(experience) as total_experience FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_id, player_name, level, experience FROM player_progress WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(player_id) as total_players FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, player_name, level FROM player_progress WHERE experience > 500 ORDER BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, AVG(experience) as avg_experience FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_name HAVING AVG(experience) > 1000;
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM player_progress WHERE level = (SELECT MAX(level) from player_progress);
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM player_progress WHERE player_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT player_id, player_name, level FROM player_progress WHERE level > 10 ORDER BY player_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' AND level BETWEEN 5 AND 15
SELECT player_id, player_name, level, experience FROM player_progress WHERE experience > 1000 ORDER BY experience DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_name, level FROM player_progress WHERE level < 5 OR experience < 500
SELECT player_id, player_name, experience FROM player_progress WHERE level <= 20 AND experience >= 500
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_progress WHERE level = 5 AND experience = 1000
SELECT player_name, level FROM player_progress WHERE level IN (10, 15, 20)
SELECT player_id, player_name, experience FROM player_progress WHERE player_name = 'John Doe' OR player_name = 'Jane Smith'
SELECT player_id, level FROM player_progress WHERE player_name LIKE '%son%'
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE level = 10 ORDER BY player_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT player_name, experience FROM player_progress WHERE level = 15
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_progress WHERE experience > 2000 AND level > 15
SELECT player_name, level, experience FROM player_progress WHERE experience < 500 OR level > 10
SELECT player_name, level FROM player_progress WHERE player_name NOT LIKE '%test%'
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_progress WHERE experience BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT player_id, player_name, level FROM player_progress WHERE player_name = 'Alice' AND level < 10
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE level = 5 AND experience < 1000
SELECT player_id, experience FROM player_progress WHERE level > 15
SELECT player_name, level FROM player_progress WHERE player_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY level DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, player_name, level FROM player_progress WHERE player_name IN ('Alice','Bob','Charlie')
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT player_name, player_exp FROM players WHERE player_level < 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT player_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT player_id, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions JOIN players ON transactions.player_id = players.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING AVG(transaction_amount) > 50;
SELECT player_name, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions JOIN players ON transactions.player_id = players.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions JOIN players ON transactions.player_id = players.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions JOIN players ON transactions.player_id = players.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING AVG(transaction_amount) > 75;
SELECT player_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions JOIN players ON transactions.player_id = players.player_id WHERE player_level > 5 GROUP BY player_name;

SELECT player_name, transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions JOIN players ON transactions.player_id = players.player_id WHERE player_level > 5 GROUP BY player_name, transaction_type;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions JOIN players ON transactions.player_id = players.player_id WHERE transaction_amount > 50 GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_exp > 1000;
SELECT player_id, player_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id GROUP BY player_id, player_name;
SELECT player_id, player_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions JOIN players ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id GROUP BY player_id, player_name;
SELECT player_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY player_name;

SELECT player_name, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY player_name;

SELECT player_name, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY player_name;

SELECT player_name, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_transaction_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY player_name;

SELECT player_id, player_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY player_id, player_name;

SELECT player_id, player_name, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount_per_transaction FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY player_id, player_name;

SELECT player_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY player_name;

SELECT player_name, transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE player_level > 5 GROUP BY player_name, transaction_type;

SELECT player_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE player_level < 5 AND transaction_type = 'rewards' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT player_name, player_exp, transaction_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE player_exp > 5000 AND transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY player_exp DESC;

SELECT player_id, player_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE '%John%' GROUP BY player_id, player_name;
SELECT player_name, player_level, transaction_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT player_name, player_level, transaction_date FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT player_name, player_level, transaction_date FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transaction_type IN ('purchase', 'rewards');
SELECT player_name, player_level, transaction_date FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE player_name = 'Alice' AND player_level >= 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level, transaction_date FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE player_exp < 2000 AND transaction_type = 'purchase';

SELECT * FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id;

SELECT * FROM players LEFT JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id;
SELECT item_name, player_name FROM items RIGHT JOIN players ON items.item_id = players.player_id;
SELECT * FROM players INNER JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions LEFT JOIN items ON transactions.transaction_id = items.item_id;
SELECT player_name, item_name FROM players JOIN items ON players.player_id = items.item_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM players;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, SUM(transaction_amount) FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT item_name, item_description, item_price FROM items WHERE item_price > 100;
SELECT player_name, transaction_type, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT player_name, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_experience BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT player_name, item_name, item_price FROM players JOIN items ON players.player_level >= items.item_price;
SELECT AVG(player_level) AS avg_level FROM players;
SELECT COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM players;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, player_level, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM players LEFT JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id;
SELECT player_name, item_name, item_description FROM players CROSS JOIN items;
SELECT DISTINCT player_name FROM players;

SELECT player_name, item_name, item_description, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id JOIN items ON transactions.transaction_id = items.item_id;
SELECT item_name, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players_bought FROM items JOIN transactions ON items.item_id = transactions.player_id GROUP BY item_name;

SELECT player_name, player_level, transaction_type, item_name, item_price FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id JOIN items ON transactions.item_id = items.item_id WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';

SELECT player_name, SUM(item_price) AS total_spent FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id JOIN items ON transactions.item_id = items.item_id WHERE player_name = 'Bob';

SELECT player_name, transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_amount > 1000;

SELECT player_name, player_level, item_name, item_description FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id JOIN items ON transactions.item_id = items.item_id WHERE player_level > 10 AND item_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_id, level, experience FROM player_progress WHERE id = 1;

SELECT SUM(amount) FROM transactions WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE equipped = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_id, transaction_id, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT MAX(level) FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 7;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM game_inventory;
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transactions;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE LENGTH(player_name) > 5;
SELECT player_id, SUM(experience) FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) FROM game_inventory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name, registration_date FROM players ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, MAX(quantity) FROM game_inventory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' AND email NOT LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 1001 AND equipped = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM game_inventory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM game_inventory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, transaction_type, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id, transaction_type;
SELECT player_id, MAX(level) AS max_level FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, MIN(level) AS min_level FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, SUM(experience) AS total_experience FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, level, experience FROM player_progress WHERE level > 10 AND experience > 1000;
SELECT p.player_id, t.transaction_type, t.amount FROM players p JOIN transactions t ON p.id = t.player_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT p.player_id, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM players p JOIN transactions t ON p.id = t.player_id GROUP BY p.player_id;
SELECT p.player_name, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM players p JOIN transactions t ON p.id = t.player_id GROUP BY p.player_name;
SELECT p.player_name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM players p JOIN transactions t ON p.id = t.player_id GROUP BY p.player_name;
SELECT p.player_id, i.item_id, i.quantity FROM players p JOIN game_inventory i ON p.id = i.player_id;
SELECT p.player_id, i.item_id, i.quantity FROM players p JOIN game_inventory i ON p.id = i.player_id WHERE i.quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM players LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_name, level FROM players WHERE level > 10;
SELECT player_name, experience FROM players ORDER BY experience DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE genre = 'RPG';
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, genre FROM games ORDER BY game_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, game_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100.00;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(game_id) AS total_games FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT item_name, item_type, price FROM items ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_items WHERE quantity > 1;
SELECT player_id, item_id FROM player_items WHERE player_id = 'abc-123';
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM player_items GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, level, (experience / level) AS exp_per_level FROM players;
SELECT game_name, genre, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM release_date) AS release_year FROM games WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM release_date) = 2022;
SELECT player_id, game_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM transaction_date) = 10;
SELECT item_id, item_name, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_price FROM items JOIN player_items ON items.item_id = player_items.item_id GROUP BY item_id, item_name;
SELECT player_id, game_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM player_items GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 3;
SELECT player_name, level, CASE WHEN level < 10 THEN 'Beginner' WHEN level < 20 THEN 'Intermediate' ELSE 'Advanced' END AS level_category FROM players;
SELECT player_name, level FROM players WHERE level > 10;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM games WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE game_id = 'abc12345-6789-0123-4567-89abcdef1234' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT game_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM games JOIN transactions ON games.game_id = transactions.game_id GROUP BY game_name;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM player_items WHERE quantity > 5 GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players JOIN player_items ON players.player_id = player_items.player_id WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, level, item_name FROM players JOIN player_items ON players.player_id = player_items.player_id JOIN items ON player_items.item_id = items.item_id WHERE price > 50;
SELECT game_name, genre, SUM(amount) AS total_revenue FROM games JOIN transactions ON games.game_id = transactions.game_id GROUP BY game_name, genre ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT player_name, item_name, price FROM players JOIN player_items ON players.player_id = player_items.player_id JOIN items ON player_items.item_id = items.item_id WHERE quantity > 2 AND level > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, player_name FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE amount > 50;
SELECT game_name, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM games JOIN transactions ON games.game_id = transactions.game_id GROUP BY game_name HAVING AVG(amount) > 25;

SELECT player_name, SUM(price) AS total_value FROM players JOIN player_items ON players.player_id = player_items.player_id JOIN items ON player_items.item_id = items.item_id WHERE quantity > 1 GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_id, player_name, MAX(level) AS highest_level FROM players GROUP BY player_id, player_name ORDER BY highest_level DESC;
SELECT game_name, genre, COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) AS unique_players FROM games JOIN transactions ON games.game_id = transactions.game_id GROUP BY game_name, genre;

SELECT player_name, level, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_spent FROM players JOIN player_items ON players.player_id = player_items.player_id JOIN items ON player_items.item_id = items.item_id GROUP BY player_name, level ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT game_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players, AVG(level) AS avg_level FROM games JOIN transactions ON games.game_id = transactions.game_id JOIN players ON transactions.player_id = players.player_id GROUP BY game_name ORDER BY total_players DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT item_type, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM items GROUP BY item_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

SELECT player_id, player_name, game_name, transaction_date FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id JOIN games ON transactions.game_id = games.game_id WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01';
